--- create_table_cluster_set_on_delete.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64
) primary key (foo),
  interleave in parent foobar
             on delete cascade
--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Create:      0,
  Rparen:      49,
  IfNotExists: false,
  Name:        &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 13,
      NameEnd: 16,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull:       false,
      DefaultExpr:   (*ast.ColumnDefaultExpr)(nil),
      GeneratedExpr: (*ast.GeneratedColumnExpr)(nil),
      Hidden:        -1,
      Options:       (*ast.Options)(nil),
    },
  },
  TableConstraints: []*ast.TableConstraint(nil),
  PrimaryKeys:      []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 46,
        NameEnd: 49,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Dir: "",
    },
  },
  Synonyms: []*ast.Synonym(nil),
  Cluster:  &ast.Cluster{
    Comma:       50,
    OnDeleteEnd: 112,
    TableName:   &ast.FQN{
      Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 75,
        NameEnd: 81,
        Name:    "foobar",
      },
    },
    OnDelete: "ON DELETE CASCADE",
  },
  RowDeletionPolicy: (*ast.CreateRowDeletionPolicy)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (foo INT64) PRIMARY KEY (foo), INTERLEAVE IN PARENT foobar ON DELETE CASCADE
